item.title: New Life Being Breathed into Oak Tree Market
item.description: Following the remodel that occurred at the next door Oak Tree Cinema a few years back, HT Market is now also being remodeled. Once the remodel is complete, around 1/4 of the market will be dedicated to Real Plaza Latina, which will provide Latin groceries, baked goods, and a â€¦
item.dc:creator: timothycrosley
